question: 遷都
sourceMnemonic: If you want to <kanji>transition</kanji> the <kanji>capital</kanji> to a new, better place, you need to <vocabulary>move the capital</vocabulary>. This used to happen a lot way back in Japanese history. It's actually pretty interesting so you might want to read up on it!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
